website_summaries.verdict: A soothing cream that melts away muscle pain and other aches and with a menthol scent.
pros: This cream can ease muscle soreness, arthritic pain, and even minimize the pain from surgery
A small amount of this cream goes a long way, with some users claiming permanent healing results
cons: The cream's scent is not favored by all and will linger

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something with hemp oil to try. This had so much menthol in it I would never be able to tell. The menthol was so strong it made my eyes water. I didn't know MSM meant menthol. So, now I will be looking for some other product to try.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Organic Virgin Hemp Extract O|Pain Relief Cream and I got a product that contains Menthol, Methyl Salcylate and other ingredients but not hemp oil. When I put it on it burned like menthol and not like Hemp Oil that I have used. I am not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: Too much menthol
customer_reviews.text: This product's Active Ingredients are Mehyl Salicytate 22% and Menthol 9.5% My husband's eyes and throat are very sensitve to Menthol and this was a very strong scent. I had to wash it off and turn on the ventilator fans to get rid of it. Of course, I felt the menthol, so I don't know if the hemp did anything at all. i cannot use this, so I will give it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 600.00 I've spent on others..
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. It works for my knees and Fibromyalgia. People who think it doesn't work are welcome to try the 100.00 creams. I have spent almost 600.00 on the so called wonder creams. All I got was very expensive moisturizing body cream. ...but if you feel you must spend the money go ahead. ..I'll just keep my little jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also like the odor
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to bring relief to my hip joints and also eases the arthritic pain in my fingers. I also like the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Boucher

customer_reviews.title: TRULY WORKS ON PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Hemp Extract creme really does work for those aches and pains. Several people tried this when I purchased it and we all agreed that it does help with pain. Not only did it help, but it took the joint pain from arthritis completely away. Ive tried lots of products and this one has worked the best. My only negative thought about the product is wish it had more in the container. I definitely would order again inspite of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like the smell of menthol you might try something else
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really solid. I have a lot of hand and wrist pain from typing all day, and using this cream every day for a week or so has relieved so much of my pain and given me back some flexibility. If you don't like the smell of menthol you might try something else, but I think it smells like mint Lifesavers so I like it. Really worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: arachnaearch

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product helped me a lot with back and knees pain.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Menthol scent
customer_reviews.text: It has a menthol scent similar to over the counter muscle pain relief products.
customer_reviews.author: Pi

customer_reviews.title: Works very good. there was nothing I didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Works very good.there was nothing I didn't like. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Woods

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell that this does any better than any other topical ointment.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Gold in a jar
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my husbands feet (plantar fasciitis) and my daughters back (scoliosis)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Bengay in a different color
customer_reviews.text: I could've purchase Bengay at a cheaper price with more quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with post surgical knee pain.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after knee replacement surgery. I started using it after my incision was healed. It really helps a lot with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: lkh54

customer_reviews.title: Some pain relief, but presence of "wintergreen" smell.
customer_reviews.text: This cream does seem to help temporarily with the knee pain, but it smells like wintergreen or peppermint, and that is disagreeable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: No CBD
customer_reviews.text: This thing lies, there is absolutely no CBD in here, it's just a normal muscle cream.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: relieves pain instantly
customer_reviews.text: Rub it on your painful spot and it is like magic.
customer_reviews.author: olga Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Hemp Relieve left from another issue. I had a hard fall in our rv against the table edge, bruising some ribs. On day 4 I was really sore with a noticeable bruise. I remembered the Hemp Relieve and applied it 3 times that day. The next day all the soreness was gone! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Edith Lott

customer_reviews.title: It worked where nothing else had
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for chronic pain from arthritis and have found incredible relief. It last throughout the night and I use it again in the morning. Buying another bottle. great price too
customer_reviews.author: handleit

customer_reviews.title: Not the best hemp product I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: It was not a great product, stained my clothes and sheets and really gave me no relief.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Hemp lotion
customer_reviews.text: Lotion came fast and as expected but did little to nothing for pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Smells like wintergreen
customer_reviews.text: Got this for deep muscle aches. It's ok but wish smell wasn't so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Geenagreen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cream that has given my husband any relief from his bad back.
customer_reviews.author: cat pret

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely continue to use this amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a product that is working for me and I have only just begun using it. I will definitely continue to use this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: nancy phair

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price. Have used better cbd products before, though.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandma. She's 70. It works better than any otc pain cream she's used but much weaker than typical cbd creams. She has copd so if the menthol scent was too strong then she'd have issues. I read a lot of reviews and was skeptical but she did not have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: GREAT - I use almost everyday
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have the menthol version which I find does not have a super strong smell and sinks into skin quickly without being greasy. I have tried a more expensive equivalent product and I prefer this one much more. I mainly use it for temporary pain relief from tendonitis, lower back strain, or muscle aches. I also love rubbing a bit on my temples and forehead if I feel a headache coming on.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsbani

product_meta.title: Organic Virgin Hemp Extract Pain Relief Cream 150 mg Plus Arnica and MSM Introductory Price
